| HistoryText             = The three men were scientists who worked for [[Stane International (Earth-616)|Stane International]]. They worked on the [[Iron Monger Armor MK I]] using [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]]'s notes. Once [[Obadiah Stane (Earth-616)|Obadiah Stane]] died, they were free to run their labs for a few weeks training their new armor they were secretly working on. On their first (and only) criminal heist, they fought the [[Samuel Wilson (Earth-616)|Falcon]] but escaped promising revenge.{{r|Marvel Super-Heroes Vol 2 2}}

| Equipment               = Their armors gave them the ability of flight and enhanced durability. The armors were also armed with various weapons including ice and heat blasts as well as emit a charge of electricity.
